metadata.Title: CVE-2017-13141 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: In ImageMagick before 6.9.9-4 and 7.x before 7.0.6-4, a crafted file could trigger a memory leak in ReadOnePNGImage in coders/png.c.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> 0121-coders-png.c-Memory-leak-Fixed-Issue-600.patch in unstable 0095-coders-png.c-Memory-leak-Fixed-Issue-600.patch in stretch not fixing memory leak in trusty and xenial

criterions.comment: imagemagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
